function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Not acknowledging the historical impact of disease on urban planning","Impact":"Ineffective planning and design for disease control in the built environment","Mitigation":"Include a more comprehensive historical context of disease impact in urban planning","Technologies":"Research and data analysis tools for historical urban planning","People":"Urban planners, architects, and policymakers","Owner":"Researchers, historians, and urban planning organizations"},{"Description":"Misconception about the novelty of contagious diseases in urban settings","Impact":"Misunderstanding the unique challenges posed by different contagious diseases in the built environment","Mitigation":"Include accurate and comprehensive information about the contagious nature of different diseases","Technologies":"Data-driven analysis of disease transmission patterns","People":"Urban planners, architects, and policymakers","Owner":"Health organizations, disease experts, and urban planning organizations"},{"Description":"Overreliance on generalizations about disease contagion and spread","Impact":"Inadequate preparedness for specific disease outbreaks and transmission patterns","Mitigation":"Emphasize the need for tailored strategies for different contagious diseases","Technologies":"Risk modeling and simulation tools for disease outbreak scenarios","People":"Urban planners, architects, and policymakers","Owner":"Health organizations, disease experts, and urban planning organizations"}]}
